sub_topic: Probability of a certain type of natural disaster occurring in a region
message_1:
What is the probability of a hurricane hitting a particular city in Florida in any given year? 

Assuming that historically, a hurricane has hit the city once every 20 years on average, and the chance of a hurricane hitting the city in any given year is independent of whether a hurricane has hit in previous years.
message_2: If a hurricane hits the city once every 20 years on average, the probability of a hurricane hitting the city in any given year is 1/20 or 0.05. This means there is a 5% chance of a hurricane hitting the city in any given year, assuming the probability is independent of previous years.
